mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM douyin_user_base WHERE dy_id=#{dy_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO douyin_user_info ( dy_id, dy_tk, nickname, avatar, shortid, sign, follower, focus, likenum, opus, add_time ) VALUES( #{id}, #{tk}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{shortId}, #{signature}, #{follower}, #{focus}, #{likenum}, #{opus}, #{add_time} )

INSERT INTO douyin_videos ( dy_id, aweme_id, `desc`, aweme_type, media_type, digg_count, comment_count, play_count, share_count, forward_count, cover_img, add_time ) VALUES( #{dy_id}, #{aweme_id}, #{desc}, #{aweme_type}, #{media_type}, #{digg_count}, #{comment_count}, #{play_count}, #{share_count}, #{forward_count}, #{cover_img}, #{add_time} )
